#!/usr/bin/env Rscript

# This code is for creating documentation for ts domain
# Date                     Programmer
#----------   --------------------------------------------------------------
# Sep-06-2024    Md Yousuf Ali (md.ali@fda.hhs.gov)

load packages

library(reactable)
library(DT)
library(data.table)

read ts domain

ts_org <- haven::read_xpt('~/OneDrive - FDA/yousuf/00_github_projects/SENDsanitizer/no_git_dir/code/phuse/PDS/ts.xpt')

convert to data.frame and print

ts_org <- as.data.frame(ts_org)
ts_org
##    STUDYID DOMAIN TSSEQ TSGRPID TSPARMCD                                TSPARM

read generated ts domain

ts_fake <- haven::read_xpt('~/OneDrive - FDA/yousuf/00_github_projects/SENDsanitizer/no_git_dir/code/phuse/FAKE15218/ts.xpt')
ts_fake <- as.data.frame(ts_fake)
ts_fake
##    STUDYID DOMAIN TSSEQ TSGRPID TSPARMCD                                TSPARM

print which data changes

DT::datatable(ts_fake) |> DT::formatStyle('STUDYID',backgroundColor = 'skyblue') |>
 formatStyle('TSVAL', valueColumns = 'TSPARMCD',
backgroundColor = styleEqual(c(c('TRT','TRTV','TRTCAS','TSTFLOC','TSTFNAM',
                                 'EXPENDTC','EXPSTDTC','STITLE','STSTDTC',
                                 'SPLRNAM','TFCNTRY','SSPONSOR',
                                 'SPREFID','STDIR','TRMSAC'
                                 )), c('skyblue'))
                                 ## )), c('yellow'))
) |> formatStyle('TSPARMCD',
                 color = styleEqual(
                 c('TRT','TRTV','TRTCAS','TSTFLOC','TSTFNAM',
                                 'EXPENDTC','EXPSTDTC','STITLE','STSTDTC',
                                 'SPLRNAM','TFCNTRY','SSPONSOR',
                                 'SPREFID','STDIR','TRMSAC'), c('red')))
## PhantomJS not found. You can install it with webshot::install_phantomjs(). If it is installed, please make sure the phantomjs executable can be found via the PATH variable.
## Error in path.expand(path): invalid 'path' argument

now side by side comparison

ll <- merge(ts_org,ts_fake[,c('STUDYID','TSSEQ','TSVAL','TSPARMCD')],
            by = c('TSPARMCD','TSSEQ'),
            suffixes = c('_original','_fake'))
data.table::setDT(ll)
data.table::setcolorder(ll, c('STUDYID_original','STUDYID_fake',
                              'DOMAIN','TSSEQ','TSGRPID','TSPARMCD',
                              'TSPARM','TSVAL_original','TSVAL_fake'))

print

DT::datatable(ll) |> DT::formatStyle('STUDYID_fake',backgroundColor = 'skyblue') |>
 formatStyle('TSVAL_fake', valueColumns = 'TSPARMCD',
backgroundColor = styleEqual(c(c('TRT','TRTV','TRTCAS','TSTFLOC','TSTFNAM',
                                 'EXPENDTC','EXPSTDTC','STITLE','STSTDTC',
                                 'SPLRNAM','TFCNTRY','SSPONSOR',
                                 'SPREFID','STDIR','TRMSAC'
                                 )), c('skyblue'))
                                 ## )), c('yellow'))
) |> formatStyle('TSPARMCD',
                 color = styleEqual(
                 c('TRT','TRTV','TRTCAS','TSTFLOC','TSTFNAM',
                                 'EXPENDTC','EXPSTDTC','STITLE','STSTDTC',
                                 'SPLRNAM','TFCNTRY','SSPONSOR',
                                 'SPREFID','STDIR','TRMSAC'), c('red')))
